content.description: Dyno from the left-hand sloper and good right hand crimp.
content.location: Same start as deception, but just go up instead of working right and then back left.

content.description: Honestly I do not know if this is FA however, I didn't notice and signs or heard of anyone climbing this before. I have been projecting this for awhile everyday questioning if it was even worth the pain and effort I have put into it. Sit start on big slop/ledge in cuts around the back. Slight traverse to the right match two handed ledge. Toe onto side hook rock into the upright position while grabbing a nice sharp side pull under cling. Slightly dynamic to good top out. If you like contorting your self into odd positions and screwing up your unstretched limbs this is the climb for you.
content.location: This is on the back left side of the restroom boulder. Sit start match on big slope/ledge there are in cuts around the back.
